popularCamps.name: Heart Health Camp
popularCamps.description: This camp focuses on heart health, offering free check-ups, consultations, and advice on maintaining a healthy heart.

popularCamps.name: Diabetes Awareness Camp
popularCamps.description: Join us for a comprehensive diabetes awareness camp. Get your blood sugar levels checked and receive guidance on managing diabetes.

popularCamps.name: Dental Checkup Camp
popularCamps.description: Attend our dental checkup camp for free consultations, teeth cleaning, and advice on maintaining oral hygiene.

popularCamps.name: Pediatric Health Camp
popularCamps.description: Our pediatric health camp offers comprehensive health check-ups for children, including vaccinations and consultations.

popularCamps.name: Vision Screening Camp
popularCamps.description: Get your vision tested at our vision screening camp. We provide free eye exams and advice on maintaining good eye health.

popularCamps.name: Orthopedic Camp
popularCamps.description: Our orthopedic camp offers consultations and check-ups for bone and joint health, including free X-rays and physiotherapy advice.
